ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards]  Charming
ygData.msgSnippet: Check out the stuff on the Song Analysis site.  I have been using the procedures there and they work extremely well!.  I have also learned that some mobs will
ygData.messageBody:
Check out the stuff on the Song Analysis site. I have been using the
procedures there and they work extremely well!. I have also learned that
some mobs will attack your pet as soon as you recharm it, while others will
not forcing you to give your pet orders to attack every time you recharm.

Any word on getting the level 39 charm fixed so the -MR is actually
useful???

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2000 9:22 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Charming


Heya all, this weekend I blew through 26, 27 and most of 28, thus I've
added two big songs to my arsenal, Charm and Pixie Strike...

Pixie Strike uses are obvious, and I'm already getting good at timing
the mob's castings...

Charm is a little trickier, I have experimented with several techniques
of using the song. Is there a good reference somewhere on charm
techniques?

Thanks :)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
